arts.ttl: Oxford hit back to hold Cardiff in Ramsey's first game in charge
arts.sum: Cardiff suffered a huge blow to their survival hopes as a free-kick screamer from Cameron Brannagan salvaged a 1-1 draw for Oxford and soured Aaron Ramsey's first game as Bluebirds boss.

arts.ttl: Cameron Brannagan free-kick boosts Oxford and hits Cardiffâ€™s survival hopes
arts.sum: Results elsewhere have put the Bluebirds in real relegation peril with two games of the season left.

arts.ttl: Championship: Predictions for all 12 games on Monday
arts.sum: Alex Jack has picked out a score prediction for all 12 Championship games taking place on Easter Monday.

arts.ttl: Preview: Cardiff City vs. Oxford United - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Monday's Championship clash between Cardiff City and Oxford United, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
